name: Space War (itch) (sk0g)
description:
3rd course project in a 5 course series, assets provided by MSU.

Modifications made:

  1. Skyboxes. colour grading, post-processing, and lighting tweaked per level
  2. Added sprinting mechanic - hold shift!
    1. Changes FOV dynamically to enhance perception of speed
    2. Subtly tweaks camera angle to enhance the effect above
    3. And of course, actually increases your speed :) 
  3. Changed first and second level layouts, textures, as well as music (somewhat) for the second level
